nodes.documentation: @title Utility contract to allow pausing and unpausing of certain functions
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @notice Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @notice Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @notice Called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: _pause

nodes.documentation: @notice Called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: _unpause
